medical_history.chief_complaint: Grouped telangiectases on the right forearm in a 2-month-old girl.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The telangiectases were present at birth and formed a pale erythematous patch over the wrist. They have remained largely unchanged for 2 years and have shown no sign of proliferation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Uncomplicated first pregnancy; birth at 41 weeks gestation with a birth weight of 3500 g. No other relevant medical history specified.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of similar lesions.
